p: In this study, 0.1 g leaves were weighed and ground with 0.5 mL PBS (50 mM; pH 7.3) on ice and then left at 4 °C for 2 h. The grinding solution was centrifuged at 4 °C for 20 min at 5000× g, and the supernatant was the hormone extract. The contents of the hormone were determined by a plant ELISA Kit (Zike, Shenzhen, China).
